alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Nuckolls; Thayer; Webster; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 18 at 4:39PM CST until January 18 at 5:30PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Northeastern Mitchell County in north central Kansas... Jewell County in north central Kansas... Northeastern Smith County in north central Kansas... Southern Clay County in south central Nebraska... Nuckolls County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Webster County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern York County in east central Nebraska... Fillmore County in south central Nebraska... Thayer County in south central Nebraska... * Until 530 PM CST. * At 437 PM CST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Utica to near Clay Center to near Lawrence to 6 miles northwest of Bellaire, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions with near zero visibility associated with intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 55 mph could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. SOURCE...Trained spotter. IMPACT...Dangerous and life-threatening travel conditions are expected to develop rapidly in the warning area. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 363 and 365. Locations impacted include... Beloit, Geneva, Superior, Smith Center, Hebron, Sutton, Red Cloud, Mankato, Deshler, Exeter, Fairmont, Edgar, Nelson, Glen Elder, Jewell, McCool Junction, Fairfield, Shickley, Lawrence, and Davenport. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents. SNOW SQUALL...OBSERVED SNOW SQUALL IMPACT...SIGNIFICANT

area.areaDesc: Clay; Fillmore; Nuckolls; Thayer; Webster; York
